title: Robot Commission Request
description: Request a change in the commission of a robot, i.e. whether it accepts dispatched and/or direct tasks

type.description: Indicate that this is a robot commission request

fleet.description: The fleet the robot belongs to

commission.description: Describe the requested commission for this robot

dispatch_tasks.description: Should the robot accept dispatched tasks, true/false. Leave unset to not change the robot's current value.

direct_tasks.description: Should the robot accept direct task requests, true/false. Leave unset to not change the robot's current value.

idle_behavior.description: Should the robot perform its idle behavior, true/false. Leave unset to not change the robot's current value.

reassign_tasks.description: Should the tasks of the decommissioned robot be reassigned to other robots? If unset, it will be treated as true.
